data.name: Gladiator Guild Manager: Prologue
data.detailed_description:
ADD FULL GAME TO YOUR WISHLIST

https://store.steampowered.com/app/1043260/Gladiator_Guild_Manager/
Checkout Garbage Game Free Prologue on Steam
https://store.steampowered.com/app/1494440/Garbage_Hobo_Prophecy/


About the Game

Gladiator Guild Manager is a game about building your guild, buying, developing and equipping units, figuring out tactics in different arenas against various opponents and becoming the most powerful gladiator guild in this epic fantasy world.

Features:

  • Each gladiator has Strengths, Weaknesses, Unique Behaviours, and Abilities.
  • Each battle let's you choose a team of several units. Figure out best combinations that compliment each other as well as counter the enemy team.


  • The direction you choose to Build Your Own Guild will determine which warriors, beasts, or mages you can hire, as well as their perks.


  • Dynamic Market with new gladiators and items arriving every day. It's up to you to find the best deals.
  • Level them up, equip them with the finest items and make unique team combinations.


  • Combine and Craft Items. Use items to make up for your fighters weaknesses or to boost their strengths even more.
  • Meet all the challenges and conquer all the arenas in this epic fantasy world.

Early Access

Early Access has been released!

Prologue was made more than a year ago in order to find out how much you guys would enjoy this kind of game and in what direction we should take the game moving forward.

Early Access has the same premise of leading a gladiator guild but has changed a lot, hugely by the feedback of the community. You can take a look at what is new and different on our Early Access Page.

data.short_description: Gladiator Guild Manager: Prologue is a battle sim about managing your own Gladiator Guild in an epic fantasy world. Build and run your own guild, hire and train gladiators, develop unique tactics, manage resources, compete for the rank in the arena, and much more.
data.supported_languages: English, Italian, German, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Korean, Spanish - Spain, Portuguese - Brazil, Spanish - Latin America, French, Czech, Japanese, Portuguese, Turkish, Polish, Hungarian

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows Vista or greater
  • Processor: 4 Ghz
  • Graphics: 256mb Video Memory, capable of Shader Model 2.0+

content_descriptors.notes: The game contains cartoony blood and violence.
